replies.message: We love you too, Phong! Have a great day. - Elissa
I want to uninstall messenger but it won't let me .... Please help I don't want it !!! Please
The majority of us love FaceBook too - if you're going to data mine at least let us use animated type graphics. Facebook is so boring anymore. WHY do we use it at all??
I m also love with facebook .

Delete, delete , delete. Do you people have your heads in the sand?  Do you know what they are doing?  Or are you getting paid to say how much you love it?!!!  Oh I just love that they can use my own phone to take a picture of me and put it out in the universe or that they can make calls with my phone or listen to my conversations!!!  Soilent Green, Big Brother people !!!  Where have you been?????
Facebook used to be great. Now they suck.

I can't wait for facebook's replacement. Hurry up tech people! lol
FB is getting old and boring. The way they ruin my newsfeed is just ridiculous. As if they know what I want, no they don't. I want to see every person on my list and every page I like in my newsfeed. I do not. So no, they obviously do not know what I want to see in my newsfeed.
